text: Landing pages measure conversion rate and effectiveness in a separate section for reporting.
how does the google console app integration work with HubSpot? can you use the app to hook up to things like ahrefs or do you still need to add code?

had a client who wanted this actually and they just used a load balancer and redirected all traffic on /userguide away to a different server. obviously not recommended as it messes with HubSpot's server setup recommendation
the analytics is different, and also it's cleaner to separate pages like that, especially if your site is quite large.
